DOC.brief_summary: This study define cancer caregiver unpaid individual provide physical , practical , and/or emotional care support cancer patient home set . They may participate study care recipient caregiver adult ( 18 year old ) , patient diagnose cancer.The 8 intervention session target five domain Quality Of Life ( emotional , physical , social , cognitive , spiritual well-being ) , provide group setting , deliver two 45-minute session week 4-week period .
DOC.brief_title: Phase I/II Cancer Caregiver Interventions Improve Quality Life Prevent Burnout
DOC.criteria: Ability provide write informed consent .
